original_text: She gets up while it is still night and she prepares food for her family. She also gives some to her female servants.
korean_text: 밤이 새기 전에 일어나서 자기 집안 사람들에게 음식을 나누어 주며 여종들에게 일을 정하여 맡기며

sentences.original_text: She gets up while it is still night
she prepares food for her family
She also gives some to her female servants
